SECURITY_TIPS.TITLE: Security Tips
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_1: Use a unique password that you haven't used for other accounts
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_2: Include a combination of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_3: Consider enabling two-factor authentication for enhanced security
SECURITY_TIPS.TIP_4: Regularly review your login activity and active sessions

CHANGE_PASSWORD_FORM.SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address.

VALIDATION.MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters
VALIDATION.UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
VALIDATION.LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
VALIDATION.NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number
VALIDATION.SPECIAL: Password must contain at least one special character

ERRORS.SAME_PASSWORD: New password must be different from current password
ERRORS.GENERIC_ERROR: An error occurred while updating your password. Please try again.

help.HERO_SUBTITLE: The most complete directory boilerplate, enhanced with AI and packed with all the essential features: listings, payments, submissions, CMS, blog, authentication, newsletter, SEO, themes, and more.
help.HERO_FEATURE_1_DESC: Streamlined content organization and automated workflows
help.HERO_FEATURE_2_DESC: Modern, responsive layouts that convert visitors
help.HERO_FEATURE_3_DESC: Built-in monetization tools for sustainable growth
help.HERO_DEMO_DESCRIPTION: Experience the power of modern directory solutions
help.HERO_SPECIAL_OFFER: ðŸ”¥ Limited Time: Free Premium Templates
help.HERO_SUBTITLE_FEATURES: and everything you need to build a successful directory platform.

help.MONETIZATION_SECTION_SUBTITLE: Multiple revenue streams built-in to help you generate income from your directory from day one

help.NEED_HELP_DESC: We're here to help you build and grow your directory platform. Choose the support option that works best for you.
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_PROCESS_STEP1_DESC: Set up the foundation of your directory platform with our starter template
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_PROCESS_STEP2_DESC: Personalize your directory with themes, categories, and custom settings
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_PROCESS_STEP3_DESC: Populate your directory with items and deploy to production

help.HOW_IT_WORKS_PROCESS_DESC: Follow our proven methodology to create a successful directory platform
help.TECH_NEXTJS_DESC: React framework for building directory platforms with server-side rendering
help.TECH_TYPESCRIPT_DESC: Type-safe JavaScript for building robust directory applications
help.TECH_TAILWIND_DESC: Utility-first CSS framework for styling your directory interface
help.TECH_SUPABASE_DESC: Open-source backend for directory data storage and authentication - perfectly integrated with our GitHub-native approach
help.BENEFITS_FAST_DESC: Get your directory platform running in under 10 minutes
help.BENEFITS_SECURE_DESC: Built-in security best practices and authentication for directories
help.BENEFITS_MOBILE_DESC: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on all devices
help.BENEFITS_CUSTOMIZABLE_DESC: Easy to customize with themes, layouts, and directory-specific features
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE: Build Your Directory in 3 Simple Steps
help.HOW_IT_WORKS_DESCRIPTION: Follow our streamlined process to create a professional directory platform that's ready to accept submissions and generate revenue.
help.TECH_STACK_SUBTITLE: Industry-standard technologies optimized for building scalable directory platforms
help.ENV_CONFIG_DESC: Set up the essential environment variables needed to run your directory platform securely and efficiently
help.ENV_CONFIG_LOCAL_DEV_DESC: Set up your local development environment
help.ENV_CONFIG_NEED_HELP_DESC: Our support team is here to help you configure your directory platform correctly
help.FAQ_SETUP_TIME: How long does it take to build a directory?
help.FAQ_SETUP_TIME_ANSWER: With our directory builder, you can have a professional directory running in under 10 minutes.
help.FAQ_CODING_EXPERIENCE_ANSWER: No coding required! Our open-source, AI-powered directory builder makes it easy for anyone to create professional directories. Free template, GitHub-native, SaaS optional.
help.FAQ_CUSTOMIZE_DESIGN: Can I customize my directory design?
help.FAQ_CUSTOMIZE_DESIGN_ANSWER: Yes! Ever Works offers extensive customization options with multiple themes and layouts for your directory.
help.FAQ_HOSTING: Where can I host my directory?
help.FAQ_HOSTING_ANSWER: We recommend Vercel for the best performance, but your directory works with any Node.js hosting provider.
help.FAQ_PAYMENT_INTEGRATION: How do I integrate payment processing?
help.FAQ_PAYMENT_INTEGRATION_ANSWER: Our directory platform comes with pre-configured Stripe integration. Simply add your API keys in the environment variables and the payment system will be ready for premium listings.
help.FAQ_CUSTOM_DOMAIN: Can I use my own domain?
help.FAQ_CUSTOM_DOMAIN_ANSWER: Yes! You can easily connect your custom domain to your directory. We provide step-by-step instructions for domain configuration with popular providers.
help.QUICK_START_DESC: Get your directory platform up and running quickly
help.ENV_SETUP_DESC: Configure your environment variables and API keys
help.USAGE_GUIDE_DESC: Learn how to use and customize your directory
help.TECH_STACK_DESC: Explore the technologies powering your directory
help.MONETIZATION_DESC: Learn how to generate revenue from your directory
help.SUPPORT_DESC: Get help and find answers to common questions
help.JOIN_DEVELOPERS_DESC: Join thousands of developers who are already building amazing directory platforms with our open-source, AI-powered builder. Free template. GitHub-native. SaaS optional.
help.TRY_ADJUSTING_FILTERS: Try adjusting your filters to see more results
help.READY_TO_BUILD_WITH_TECH: Ready to Build Your Directory with These Technologies?

help.START_MONETIZING_DESC: Choose the monetization strategy that best fits your directory platform and start generating revenue immediately.
help.INTERACTIVE_GUIDE_DESC: Follow the steps to build your directory platform

ERRORS.ID_LENGTH: Tag ID must be between {min} and {max} characters
ERRORS.ID_FORMAT: Tag ID must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
ERRORS.NAME_LENGTH: Tag name must be between {min} and {max} characters

DELETE_ROLE_DIALOG.TITLE: Delete Role
DELETE_ROLE_DIALOG.WARNING_MESSAGE: This role will be soft-deleted (hidden and excluded from use). Users currently assigned to this role will lose these permissions.

ROLE_FORM.SUBTITLE_CREATE: Create a new role with the appropriate access level
ROLE_FORM.SUBTITLE_EDIT: Update the role information and access level
ROLE_FORM.ROLE_NAME_PLACEHOLDER: Enter role name (e.g., Admin, Manager, User)
ROLE_FORM.DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Describe the role's purpose and responsibilities...
ROLE_FORM.ACTIVE_DESCRIPTION: This role is active and can be assigned to users
ROLE_FORM.INACTIVE_DESCRIPTION: This role is inactive and cannot be assigned to new users
ROLE_FORM.ROLE_TYPE_DESCRIPTION: Admin roles have elevated permissions, client roles have standard access.

ERRORS.NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Role name must be at least 3 characters
ERRORS.NAME_MAX_LENGTH: Role name must be at most 100 characters
ERRORS.DESCRIPTION_MAX_LENGTH: Role description must be at most 500 characters

ITEM_FORM.SUBTITLE_CREATE: Add a new item to the collection
ITEM_FORM.ITEM_NAME_PLACEHOLDER: Enter item name (e.g., Awesome Time Tracking Tool)
ITEM_FORM.DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Enter detailed description of the item...
ITEM_FORM.CATEGORIES_PLACEHOLDER: Enter categories separated by commas (e.g., productivity, time-tracking, cli)

ADMIN_CLIENTS_PAGE.TITLE: Client Management

ADMIN_CLIENTS_PAGE.NO_CLIENTS_DESCRIPTION: Get started by adding your first client.
ADMIN_CLIENTS_PAGE.NO_CLIENTS_FILTER_DESCRIPTION: Try adjusting your filters or search terms.
ADMIN_CLIENTS_PAGE.DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this client? This action cannot be undone.
ADMIN_CLIENTS_PAGE.FILTER_SUBTITLE: Refine your client search with advanced filters

ADMIN_CLIENT_DETAIL_PAGE.BILLING_DESCRIPTION: Payment and subscription details will appear here once configured.

ADMIN_COMPANIES_PAGE.TITLE: Company Management
ADMIN_COMPANIES_PAGE.SUBTITLE: Manage companies and their information
ADMIN_COMPANIES_PAGE.NO_COMPANIES_DESCRIPTION: Get started by adding your first company.
ADMIN_COMPANIES_PAGE.COMPANY_DOMAIN_HINT: Optional: Used for email domain matching (will be normalized to lowercase)
ADMIN_COMPANIES_PAGE.COMPANY_SLUG_HINT: Optional: URL-friendly identifier (lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only)
ADMIN_COMPANIES_PAGE.DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this company? This action cannot be undone.
ADMIN_COMPANIES_PAGE.WARNING_DISABLED_MESSAGE: Companies are hidden from the public site including item company assignments. You can still manage companies here, but they won't be visible to users until re-enabled.

ITEM_COMPANY.TITLE: Company Assignment
ITEM_COMPANY.HELPER_TEXT: Search and assign a company to this item. Only active companies are shown.

ADMIN_CATEGORIES_PAGE.TITLE: Category Management
ADMIN_CATEGORIES_PAGE.SUBTITLE: Organize and manage your content categories
ADMIN_CATEGORIES_PAGE.NO_CATEGORIES_DESCRIPTION: Create your first category to start organizing your content.
ADMIN_CATEGORIES_PAGE.DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to {action} this category?
ADMIN_CATEGORIES_PAGE.WARNING_DISABLED_MESSAGE: Categories are hidden from the public site including navigation, filters, and item pages. You can still manage categories here, but they won't be visible to users until re-enabled.

ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.CATEGORIES_ENABLED_DESC: Enable or disable categories throughout the site. When disabled, category filters, pages, and navigation will be hidden.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.COMPANIES_ENABLED_DESC: Enable or disable companies throughout the site. When disabled, company management and item company assignments will be hidden.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.TAGS_ENABLED_DESC: Enable or disable tags throughout the site. When disabled, tag filters, pages, and navigation will be hidden.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.SURVEYS_ENABLED_DESC: Enable or disable surveys throughout the site. When disabled, survey features will be hidden from non-admin users.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.SURVEYS_DISABLED_WARNING: Surveys feature is currently disabled in settings
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.HEADER_SUBMIT_ENABLED_DESC: Show or hide the Submit button in the header navigation.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.HEADER_PRICING_ENABLED_DESC: Show or hide the Pricing link in the header navigation.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.HEADER_LAYOUT_ENABLED_DESC: Show or hide the layout switcher control in the header.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.HEADER_LANGUAGE_ENABLED_DESC: Show or hide the language selector control in the header.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.HEADER_THEME_ENABLED_DESC: Show or hide the dark/light theme toggle in the header.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.HEADER_LAYOUT_DEFAULT_DESC: Set the default layout style for the homepage.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.HEADER_PAGINATION_DEFAULT_DESC: Set the default pagination type for item lists.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.HEADER_THEME_DEFAULT_DESC: Set the default color theme for the site.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.HERO_ENABLED_DESC: Show or hide the hero section on the homepage.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.SEARCH_ENABLED_DESC: Show or hide the search functionality on the homepage.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.DEFAULT_VIEW_DESC: Set the default view layout for the item list.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.DEFAULT_SORT_DESC: Set the default sort order for items.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.FOOTER_SUBSCRIBE_ENABLED_DESC: Show or hide the 'Stay Updated' newsletter subscription form in the footer.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.FOOTER_VERSION_ENABLED_DESC: Show or hide the version information in the footer.
ADMIN_SETTINGS_PAGE.FOOTER_THEME_SELECTOR_ENABLED_DESC: Show or hide the theme selector control in the footer.

AUTH_FORM.ADMIN_WELCOME_DESCRIPTION: Please sign in with your admin credentials to access the management section. Only authorized administrators are allowed beyond this point.
AUTH_FORM.USER_MANAGEMENT_DESC: Manage user accounts, permissions, and access levels
AUTH_FORM.ANALYTICS_DASHBOARD_DESC: Monitor system performance and user activity

CREDENTIALS_FORM.WELCOME_BACK_MESSAGE: Welcome back! Please sign in to your account
CREDENTIALS_FORM.CREATE_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE: Create your account to get started
CREDENTIALS_FORM.RECAPTCHA_VERIFICATION_FAILED: ReCAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again.
CREDENTIALS_FORM.FAILED_TO_LOAD_VERIFICATION: Failed to load security verification. Please refresh the page.
CREDENTIALS_FORM.VERIFICATION_EXPIRED: Security verification expired. Please complete it again.

FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.TITLE: Forgot Password?
FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.SUBTITLE: No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.SUCCESS_NOTE: If you don't see the email in your inbox, please check your spam folder.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.ERROR_MESSAGE: We couldn't send the reset email. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_PAGE.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address

NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.TITLE: Set New Password
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.SUBTITLE: Create a strong password that you don't use for other websites
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Create a strong password to protect your account and ensure secure access to our professional platform.
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.LINK_EXPIRED: This password reset link has expired or is invalid
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.TOKEN_INVALID: The reset token is no longer valid. Please request a new password reset link.
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.PASSWORD_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now log in with your new password.
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.ACCOUNT_SECURE_MESSAGE: Your account is now secure with your new password. Please keep it safe and don't share it with anyone.
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.ERROR_VERIFYING_TOKEN: An error occurred while verifying the reset token
NEW_PASSWORD_PAGE.FAILED_SET_PASSWORD: Failed to set new password. Please try again.

EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.TITLE: Email Verification
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.SUBTITLE: Verifying your email helps us secure your account and keep you informed about important updates.
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.GET_ACCESS_FEATURES: Get access to all features once verified
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.PLEASE_WAIT: Please wait while we verify your email address...
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.VERIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your email has been successfully verified. You now have full access to all features.
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PAGE.VERIFICATION_ERROR_MESSAGE: There was a problem verifying your email.
